titleStmt.title: A hellish murder committed by a French midwife on the body of her husband, Jan. 27, 1687/8 for which she was arraigned at the Old-Baily, Feb. 22, 1687/8, and pleaded guilty and the day following received sentence to be burnt.
titleStmt.author: Hobry, Marie, d. 1688.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed for R. Sare ... and published by Randal Taylor ...,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of original in the Bodleian Library.
